name: Label list for Categories and Archives
author: Marek Vrtich

sections.description:
With this plugin you can easily set up sidebar list for your categories and archives.

Features

  • Widget supports two types of lists – Archive list and Categories list
  • In Archive list you can choose from three periods – daily, monthly or yearly
  • In Categories list default order is alphabetical, you can change it to order by post count (ascend or descend)
  • You can set the number of lines to show in the list
  • You can style the list with custom font sizes and font and background colors
  • You can add your own CSS styles

Translation

  • Slovak
  • Hungarian

If you would like to create your own language pack or update the existing one, you can send the text of PO and MO files at marek.vrtich@mvmtrade.sk
sections.installation:
1. Upload category-archive-label-list-widget to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Added Hungarian language

1.1.1

  • Ready for translations
  • Added Slovak language

1.1

  • Bug (Notices) fixes

1.0

  • First release of this plugin

short_description: This Label List Widget helps you to create a nice category or archive list with labels.
